function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Global spread of Covid-19","Impact":"Exponential increase in contagion and strain on healthcare systems","Mitigation":"International travel restrictions, mass testing, and contact tracing","Technologies":"Digital contact tracing apps, PCR testing, and vaccine development","People":"General public, healthcare workers, and high-risk individuals","Owner":"Governments, international health organizations, and healthcare institutions"},{"Description":"Financial market impact","Impact":"Historic lows and market volatility","Mitigation":"Fiscal stimulus, monetary policy interventions, and market stabilization measures","Technologies":"Algorithmic trading mechanisms, financial risk models, and high-frequency trading platforms","People":"Investors, financial institutions, and regulators","Owner":"Central banks, financial regulators, and economic policy makers"},{"Description":"Lockdown measures in EU member states","Impact":"Economic disruption and social hardship","Mitigation":"Gradual reopening, financial support for businesses and individuals, and vaccination programs","Technologies":"Remote work infrastructure, digital payment solutions, and vaccine distribution systems","People":"Workers, businesses, and vulnerable populations","Owner":"Governments, local authorities, and public health agencies"}]}
